Layouts.Name: Reconstruction
Layouts.Description: A visual reconstruction of Atlantis.{0}{0}Structures are inferred or improvised for asthetics.

RootTemplate.Description: This is a Reconstruction layout using the {1} system.{0}{0}{2}{0}{0}1 {3} = {4} m (meters).

Layouts.Name: Solar System (Current)
Layouts.Description: Solar System layouts using different systems of measurement.{0}{0}The layout is rendered to scale. The radii of the orbits are calculated using the following formula:{0}{0}Distance on Earth = Distance in Space / (Pi * Radius of Earth)

RootTemplate.Description: This is a solar system layout using the {1} system.{0}{0}{2}{0}{0}1 {3} = {4} m (meters).

Folders.Name: Sun
Folders.Description: This is just a visual placeholder for the sun. Its size is arbituary. I.e. it has no mathematical origin.

Folders.Name: Asteroid Belt
Folders.Description: No conspicuous corresponding zones, boundaries, or landmarks.

Folders.Name: Saturn
Folders.Description: Center Island Mirror. I.e. Temple of Cronus.

Folders.Name: Uranus
Folders.Description: No conspicuous corresponding zones, boundaries, or landmarks.{0}{0}Possible buried/eroded temple location. I.e. Temple of Uranus.

Folders.Name: Neptune
Folders.Description: No conspicuous corresponding zones, boundaries, or landmarks.{0}{0}Possible buried/eroded temple location. However, since Neptune is Poseidon, it is unclear what this temple should be called.
